title: Battery drain and slow charge
content: I have a pixel 1 XL and recently the battery has been draining really fast and charging extremely slow. I checked my battery usage and it's been 20 hours since my last full charge and I've only use my phone for about one and a half hours, but I can't seem to get anything to work as it should. Earlier while I was on the phone with Google support I was watching as my battery dwindled even though I was plugged in. Over the night last night I had my phone plugged in the whole night and only got up to about 60%
